snippet.title: Super Mario Dynamo - Trailer - Version 1.1 Update
snippet.description:
The people of the Mushroom Kingdom have finally embraced industrialization, and it is all thanks to everyone's favorite plumber, Luigi! Unfortunately, Luigi's greed got the best of him, and the entire kingdom became shrouded in darkness. The thick smog emanating from Luigi's accomplishments have darkened the once bright and colorful kingdom. It is now up to Mario to try and solve this dilemma!

The version 1.1 update includes the all new Daredevil Mode, a game mode where every hit results in instant death! The update also includes minor level design tweaks and backported bug fixes.

Download Game (Included in the Hello Fangaming Time Capsule)
https://www.indiedb.com/games/hello-fangaming-time-capsule-launcher/downloads/hello-fangaming-time-capsule

Music: The Path to Smithy and the Final Battle by GaMetal
